Title: Notice for Lost Data Memory
Text:
[LOST DATA MEMORY!]
Lost a data memory unit! I think it was about three days ago…? I've forgotten the exact time. Anyway, it's a small silver memory unit with my dissertation on it. If found, please contact me! I'm offering ten Canned Surprises as a reward!

[From "LahaiRoiTrekkingFanClub"]
…I did find something matching that description while trekking near the Etching Plains. But this is the station's Lost and Found… Are you sure you didn't lose it on the train?

[From LostMyDataMemory]
Ah… the Etching Plains, huh? I actually went there for a survey a few days ago. It might've gotten lost while I was out there.

[From "LahaiRoiTrekkingFanClub"]
Got it. Swing by and we'll see if it's yours.
